Body: Description: Problems Running Web Interface since onboarding Several Thousand Windows Devices

What We've Learned Updated: We helped the customer to migrate from an older EPP Server Appliance running on Ubuntu 14 to our latest EPP Server appliance running on Ubuntu 22.

In our remote session we optimized the new EPP Server appliance for the below resources.
For 3000 endpoints:
x12 CPU cores
16 GB RAM
3 TB HDD storage

Next Steps Updated: In our remote session we optimized the new EPP Server appliance for the below resources.
